subjectline.content: Welcome onboard - save energy the smart way

html.content:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<html>
  <head>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=0" />
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
    <style type="text/css">
      ReadMsgBody{
        width: 100%;
      }
      .ExternalClass {
        width: 100%;
      }
      .ExternalClass, .ExternalClass p, .ExternalClass span, .ExternalClass font, .ExternalClass td, .ExternalClass div {
        line-height: 100%;
      }
      body {
        -webkit-text-size-adjust:100%;
        -ms-text-size-adjust:100%;
        margin:0 !important;
      }
      p {
        margin: 1em 0;
      }
      table td {
        border-collapse: collapse;
      }
      img {
        outline:0;
      }
      a img {
        border:none;
      }
      @-ms-viewport{
        width: device-width;
      }
    </style>
    <style type="text/css">
      @media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
        .container {
          width: 100% !important;
        }
        .footer {
          width:auto !important;
          margin-left:0;
        }
        .mobile-hidden {
          display:none !important;
        }
        .logo {
          display:block !important;
          padding:0 !important;
        }
        img {
          max-width:100% !important;
          height:auto !important;
          max-height:auto !important;
        }
        .header img{
          max-width:100% !important;
          height:auto !important;
          max-height:auto !important;
        }
        .photo img {
          width:100% !important;
          max-width:100% !important;
          height:auto !important;
        }
        .drop {
          display:block !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          float:left;
          clear:both;
        }
        .footerlogo {
          display:block !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          padding-top:15px;
          float:left;
          clear:both;
        }
        .nav4, .nav5, .nav6 {
          display: none !important;
        }
        .tableBlock {
          width:100% !important;
        }
        .responsive-td {
          width:100% !important;
          display:block !important;
          padding:0 !important;
        }
        .fluid, .fluid-centered {
          width: 100% !important;
          max-width: 100% !important;
          height: auto !important;
          margin-left: auto !important;
          margin-right: auto !important;
        }
        .fluid-centered {
          margin-left: auto !important;
          margin-right: auto !important;
        }
        /* MOBILE GLOBAL STYLES - DO NOT CHANGE */
        body {
          padding: 0px !important;
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 150% !important;
        }
        h1 {
          font-size: 22px !important;
          line-height: normal !important;
        }
        h2 {
          font-size: 20px !important;
          line-height: normal !important;
        }
        h3 {
          font-size: 18px !important;
          line-height: normal !important;
        }
        .buttonstyles {
          font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif !important;
          font-size: 16px !important;
          color: #FFFFFF !important;
          padding: 10px !important;
        }
        /* END OF MOBILE GLOBAL STYLES - DO NOT CHANGE */
      }
      @media only screen and (max-width: 640px) {
        .container {
          width:100% !important;
        }
        .mobile-hidden {
          display:none !important;
        }
        .logo {
          display:block !important;
          padding:0 !important;
        }
        .photo img {
          width:100% !important;
          height:auto !important;
        }
        .nav5, .nav6 {
          display: none !important;
        }
        .fluid, .fluid-centered {
          width: 100% !important;
          max-width: 100% !important;
          height: auto !important;
          margin-left: auto !important;
          margin-right: auto !important;
        }
        .fluid-centered {
          margin-left: auto !important;
          margin-right: auto !important;
        }
      }
    </style>
    <!--[if mso]>
<style type="text/css">
/* Begin Outlook Font Fix */
body, table, td {
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif ;
font-size:16px;
color:#000000;
line-height:1;
}
/* End Outlook Font Fix */
</style>
<![endif]-->
    <style type="text/css">
      /* ---------------------- Destop Styles ---------------------- */
      .contents {
        width: 100%;
      }
      .full-width-shell-energy-logo img {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 320px!important;
        height: auto;
      }
      .weblinktext {
        font-size: 11px;
        line-height: 12px;
        font-weight: normal;
        color: #404040;
        margin: 0px;
      }
      .h1 {
        font-size: 34px !important;
        line-height: 40px !important;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        margin: 0px !important;
      }
      .h2 {
        font-size: 30px !important;
        line-height: 36px !important;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        margin: 0px;
      }
      .firstname {
        font-size: 17px;
        line-height: 23px;
        font-weight: bold;
        font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        color:#DD1D21;
        margin: 0px;
      }
      .accountnumber {
        font-size: 17px;
        line-height: 23px;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        color:#DD1D21;
        margin: 0px;
      }
      body {
        margin: 0 !important;
        padding: 0;
      }
      .bodycopy {
        font-size: 17px;
        line-height: 23px;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
      }
      .footertext {
        font-size: 11px !important;
        line-height: 12px !important;
        font-weight: normal;
        color:#404040;
      }
      .leftrightpadding {
        padding-left: 60px !important;
        padding-right: 60px !important;
      }
      /* Make images 100% in width */
      .full-width-image img {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 600px!important;
        height: auto;
      }
      .bodycopyinsidetable {
        font-size: 17px !important;
        line-height: 22px!important;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-family: Furura, Arial,Helvetica, sans-serif;
        color:#404040;
      }
      .applelinksred a {
        color:#DD1D21 !important;
        text-decoration: none!important;
      }
      .applelinkswhite a {
        color:#FFFFFF !important;
        text-decoration: none!important;
      }
      .appleLinksGrey a {
        color:#404040!important;
        text-decoration: none!important;
      }
      .mobilenumber a {
        color: inherit!important;
        text-decoration: none;
      }
      .thankssignoff {
        font-size: 18px;
        line-height: 24px;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        text-align: center;
        margin: 0px;
      }
      .shellsignoff {
        font-size: 30px;
        line-height: 41px;
        font-weight: bold;
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 27px;
        text-align: center;
      }
      .footertextlinks {
        font-size: 17px;
        line-height: 23px;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        color:#404040;
      }
      .four-column {
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 0;
      }
      .four-column .column {
        width: 100%;
        max-width:120px;
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: top;
      }
      .four-column .contents {
        font-size: 13px;
        text-align: center;
      }
      .four-column img {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 44px;
        height: auto;
      }
      .four-column .text {
        padding-top: 10px;
      }
      /* ---------------------- Media Queries for Tablet ---------------------- */
      @media screen and (min-width: 376px) and (max-width: 620px) {
        u + .body .gwfw {
          width:100% !important;
          width:100vw !important;
        }
        .extrawidth {
          width: 100% !important;
        }
        .weblinktext {
          font-size: 10px !important;
          line-height: 11px !important;
        }
        .full-width-shell-energy-logo {
          padding-top: 30px !important;
          padding-bottom: 30px !important;
        }
        .full-width-shell-energy-logo img {
          max-width: 228px!important;
        }
        .h1 {
          font-size: 28px !important;
          line-height: 34px !important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          margin: 0px !important;
        }
        .h2 {
          font-size: 24px !important;
          line-height: 30px !important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          margin: 0px;
        }
        .firstname {
          font-size: 17px;
          line-height: 23px;
          font-weight: bold;
          font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          color:#DD1D21;
          margin: 0px;
        }
        .accountnumber {
          font-size: 17px;
          line-height: 23px;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          color:#DD1D21;
          margin: 0px;
        }
        .bodycopy {
          font-size: 17px!important;
          line-height: 23px!important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        }
        .footertext {
          font-size: 10px !important;
          line-height: 11px !important;
          font-weight: normal;
          color:#404040;
        }
        .heightmobile {
          padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px!important;
        }
        .bodycopyinsidetable {
          font-size: 17px !important;
          line-height: 22px!important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Furura, Arial,Helvetica, sans-serif;
          color:#404040;
        }
        .button {
          padding-left: 38px !important;
          padding-right: 38px !important;
        }
        .button table, .button td, .button a{
          width: 100%!important;
        }
        .yellowbar {
          height: 15px !important;
        }
        .leftrightpadding {
          padding-left: 38px !important;
          padding-right: 38px !important;
        }
        .columns-responsive > td {
          display: block!important;
          width: 100%!important;
          padding-left: 0px!important;
          padding-right: 0px!important;
        }
        .columns-responsive-text  td {
          text-align: center!important;
        }
        .thankssignoff {
          font-size: 18px !important;
          line-height: 24px !important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          text-align: center;
        }
        .shellsignoff {
          font-size: 24px !important;
          line-height: 30px !important;
          font-weight: bold;
          margin-top: 20px;
          text-align: center;
        }
        .footertextlinks {
          font-size: 15px;
          line-height: 27px;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          color:#404040;
        }
        .footericonpadding {
          padding-top: 5px !important;
        }
        .four-column .column {
          max-width: 100% !important;
        }
        .four-column img {
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 44px;
          height: auto;
        }
      }
      /* -------------------- Media Queries for Mobile Start -------------------- */
      @media screen and (max-width: 375px) {
        u + .body .gwfw {
          width:100% !important;
          width:100vw !important;
        }
        .extrawidth {
          width: 100% !important;
        }
        .weblinktext {
          font-size: 10px !important;
          line-height: 11px !important;
        }
        .full-width-shell-energy-logo {
          padding-top: 30px !important;
          padding-bottom: 30px !important;
        }
        .full-width-shell-energy-logo img {
          max-width: 228px!important;
        }
        .h1 {
          font-size: 28px !important;
          line-height: 34px !important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          margin: 0px !important;
        }
        .h2 {
          font-size: 24px !important;
          line-height: 30px !important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          margin: 0px;
        }
        .firstname {
          font-size: 17px;
          line-height: 23px;
          font-weight: bold;
          font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          color:#DD1D21;

        }
        .accountnumber {

          color:#DD1D21;
          margin: 0px;
        }
        .bodycopy {
          font-size: 17px!important;
          line-height: 23px!important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
        }
        .footertext {
          font-size: 10px !important;
          line-height: 11px !important;
          font-weight: normal;
          color:#404040;
        }
        .heightmobile {
          padding: 10px 10px 10p 10px !important;
        }
        .bodycopyinsidetable {
          font-size: 17px !important;
          line-height: 22px!important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Furura, Arial,Helvetica, sans-serif;
          color:#404040;
        }
        .button {
          padding-left: 38px !important;
          padding-right: 38px !important;
        }
        .button table, .button td, .button a{
          width: 100%!important;
        }
        .yellowbar {
          height: 15px !important;
        }
        .leftrightpadding {
          padding-left: 38px !important;
          padding-right: 38px !important;
        }
        .columns-responsive > td {
          display: block!important;
          width: 100%!important;
          padding-left: 0px!important;
          padding-right: 0px!important;
        }
        .columns-responsive-text  td {
          text-align: center!important;
        }
        .thankssignoff {
          font-size: 18px !important;
          line-height: 24px !important;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          text-align: center;
        }
        .shellsignoff {
          font-size: 24px !important;
          line-height: 30px !important;
          font-weight: bold;
          margin-top: 20px;
          text-align: center;
        }
        .footertextlinks {
          font-size: 15px;
          line-height: 27px;
          font-weight: normal;
          font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
          color:#404040;
        }
        .footericonpadding {
          padding-top: 20px !important;
          padding-bottom: 20px !important;
        }
        .four-column .column {
          max-width: 100% !important;
        }
        .four-column img {
          max-width: 70% !important;
          max-width: 30px;
          height: auto;
        }
        .tariffbox .savingspadding {
          padding-bottom: 21px!important;
        }
        /* Reusable Mobile Responsive banner Switcher Start*/     
        span[id=mainbannerswitcher] {
          display:block !important;
          background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
          width: 375px!important;
        }
        img[id=bannerswitcherimage] {
          display: none !important;
        }
        /* Reusable Mobile Responsive banner Switcher End*/            
        /* Mobile smart banner Switcher Start - Mobile banner should be 375 in width*/ 
        span[id=smartbannerswitcher] {
          display:block;
          background-image: url(https://image.email.shellenergy.co.uk/lib/fe4711717564047c741470/m/1/2a4d9af2-1461-4bbc-a798-1e32a885f824.png) !important;
          background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
          width: 375px !important;
          height: 372px !important;
        }
        img[id=smartbanner] {
          display: none !important;
        }
        /* Mobile smart banner switcher End */
        /* Mobile bottom banner Switcher Start - Mobile banner should be 375 in width*/
        span[id=bannerswitcher] {
          display:block;
          background-image: url(https://image.email.shellenergy.co.uk/lib/fe4711717564047c741470/m/1/e788d9d7-a091-47ff-8a52-0da3c7f7be4f.png) !important;
          background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
          width: 375px !important;
          height: 607px !important;
        }
        img[id=CarbonNeutral] {
          display: none !important;
        }
        /* Mobile bottom banner switcher End */
      }
      /* -----------------  Media Queries between 431px and 620px ------------------ */  
      @media screen and (min-width: 431px) and (max-width: 620px) {
        .image-text-layout {
          padding-right: 38px!important;
        }
        .text-image-layout {
          padding-left: 38px!important;
        }
      }
      /* -------------------- Media Queries below 431px  -------------------- */  
      @media screen and (max-width: 430px) {
        .image-text-layout td {
          width: 100%!important;
          display: block!important;
          text-align: center!important;
        }
        .image-text-layout {
          padding-right: 0px!important;
          padding-left: 0px!important;
        }
        .image-text-layout-text {
          padding-right: 38px!important;
          padding-left: 38px!important;
        }
        span[id=image-text-layout-imgswitcher] {
          display:block;
          background-image: url(https://image.email.shellenergy.co.uk/lib/fe4711717564047c741470/m/1/8535bedc-5466-4146-bce3-0f391a8fa7e9.png) !important;
          background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
          background-position: center center!important;
          background-size: contain !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          height: 200px !important;
        }
        img[id=image-text-layout-img] {
          display: none !important;
        }
        .text-image-layout td {
          width: 100%!important;
          display: block!important;
          text-align: center!important;
        }
        .text-image-layout {
          padding-right: 0px!important;
          padding-left: 0px!important;
        }
        .text-image-layout-text {
          padding-right: 38px!important;
          padding-left: 38px!important;
        }
        span[id=text-image-layout-imgswitcher] {
          display:block;
          background-image: url(https://imageassets.shellenergy.co.uk/SM_images/SE/Batch/Philips_Hue_nest_mini.png) !important;
          background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
          background-position: center center!important;
          background-size: contain !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          height: 200px !important;
        }
        img[id=text-image-layout-img] {
          display: none !important;
        }
        .apps-box table td {
          width: 100%!important;
          display: block!important;
          text-align: center!important;
          margin: auto!important;
        }
        .apps-box {
          padding-left: 10px!important;
          padding-right: 10px!important;
        }
        .apps-box img {
          max-width: 137px!important;
          margin: auto!important;
          padding: 0px!important;
        }
        .tariffbox .savings-text {
          font-size: 16px!important;
          line-height: 22px!important;
        }
        .tariffbox .savings-value {
          font-size: 33px!important;
          line-height: 33px!important;
          vertical-align: -6px!important;
        }
        .tariffbox .tariff-name {
          font-size: 26px!important;
          line-height: 33px!important;
        }
        .tariffbox .tariff-price {
          font-size: 32px!important;
          line-height: 39px!important;
        }
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body bgcolor="#F7F7F7" text="#000000" style="background-color: #F7F7F7; color: #000000; padding: 0px; -webkit-text-size-adjust:none; font-size: 16px; font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">
    <div style="font-size:0; line-height:0;">
      <custom name="opencounter" type="tracking">
        <custom name="usermatch" type="tracking" />
        </div>
      <table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" align="center">
        <tr>
          <td align="center" valign="top">
            <custom type="header"/>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td align="center">
            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" width="600" class="container" align="center">
              <tr>
                <td>
                  <table class="tb_properties border_style" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" bgcolor="#ffffff" width="100%">
                    <tr>
                      <td align="center" valign="top">
                        <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                          <tr>
                            <!-- added padding here -->
                            <td class="content_padding" style="">
                              <!-- end of comment -->
                              <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                <tr> 
                                  <!-- top slot -->
                                  <td align="center" class="header" valign="top">
                                    <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                                      <tbody>
                                        <tr>
                                          <td align="left" valign="top">
                                            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width:100%">
                                              <tbody>
                                                <tr>

                                                    <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><div style="display:none">

</div></td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">
  <tr>
    <td align="center" valign="bottom" class="contents" style="padding-top:10px; padding-left: 38px; padding-right: 38px;padding-bottom: 10px;">
      <span style="font-weight: normal; color:#404040; font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; line-height: 12px;" class="weblinktext">Having trouble seeing this email? Click <a style="color:#404040; text-decoration: underline;" href="%%view_email_url%%">here</a> to view in your browser.</span>
    </td>
  </tr>    
  <tr>
    <td align="left" class="full-width-shell-energy-logo leftrightpadding" style="padding-left: 60px; padding-right: 60px; padding-top: 43px; padding-bottom: 43px;">
      <a border="0" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk"><img src="https://image.email.shellenergy.co.uk/lib/fe4711717564047c741470/m/1/bb2018e1-80d8-43e4-850f-05f7b03650ff.png" width="320" alt="Shell Energy" title="Shell Energy" border="0" style="display: block; max-width: 320px;"></a>
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>   </td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">
 <tr>
  <td align="left" valign="top" class="contents leftrightpadding" style="padding-bottom: 32px; padding-left: 60px; padding-right: 60px;">
   <span style="font-weight: normal; color: #595959; font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration: none; margin: 0px; font-size: 34px; line-height: 40px;" class="h1">Be smart, save energy</span>
  </td>

 <tr>
  <td align="left" valign="top" class="contents leftrightpadding" style="padding-left: 60px; padding-right: 60px; padding-bottom: 15px;">
   <span style="font-weight: normal; color: #404040; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 23px;" align="left" class="bodycopy">We’d like to say thank you for joining Shell Energy.  </span>

 <tr>

   <span style="font-weight: normal; color: #404040; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 23px;" align="left" class="bodycopy">We’re committed to becoming a net-zero carbon emissions energy business by 2050. As part of that, we want to help you use less energy. </span>

 </tr>

</td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner">
</td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner">

<table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">
 <tr>
  
  <td align="left" valign="top" class="contents leftrightpadding" style="padding-left: 60px; padding-right: 60px; padding-bottom: 15px;">
   <span style="font-weight: normal; color: #404040; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 23px;" align="left" class="bodycopy">We know that as a Go Further customer, you care about saving energy. <strong>That’s why we’re sending you a [Vcode] voucher with your tariff, which you can spend on energy-saving tech at the Shell Energy shop. </strong> Your voucher can be used on any products in our Smart Energy category, which includes smart thermostats, lighting and plugs.*</span>
  </td>

 </tr>
</table>


</td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">

  </td>
 </tr>
</table>
</td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="background-color: transparent; min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td style="padding: 0px 0px 32px; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" role="presentation" align="center"><tr><td align="center"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" role="presentation" width="270"><tr><td width="270" height="50" class="innertd buttonblock" bgcolor="#DD1D21" style=" border-radius: 0px; -moz-border-radius: 0px; -webkit-border-radius: 0px; text-align: center; background-color: #DD1D21;"><a target="_blank" class="buttonstyles applelinkswhite" style=" font-size: 18px; font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #FFFFFF; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; display: block; text-align: center; background-color: #DD1D21; border: 0px solid #DD1D21; padding: 10px; border-radius: 0px; -moz-border-radius: 0px; -webkit-border-radius: 0px;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/blog/post/smart-home-beginners-guide?utm_source=CRM&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MKT_ONB_EN_CHM_EDUC-&utm_content=Smart_Home_Begginers_Guide_CTA" title="Find out more" alias="" conversion="false" data-linkto="https://"> Find out more</a></td></tr></table></td></tr></table></td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">
 <tr>

  </td>
 </tr>

</td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">
 <tr>
  <td align="left" valign="top" class="contents leftrightpadding" style="padding-left: 60px; padding-right: 60px; padding-bottom: 15px;">
    <span style="font-weight: normal; color: #404040; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 23px;" align="left" class="bodycopy">Did you know that some smart thermostats can learn your movements and automatically adjust the temperature if you’re not around? That’s an easy way to save energy while you’re away. </span>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>
</td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">
 <tr>

   <span style="font-weight: normal; color: #0097BB; font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration: none; font-size: 25px; line-height: 36px;" class="h2">Smart lighting</span>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>
</td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">
 <tr>
  <td align="left" valign="top" class="contents leftrightpadding" style="padding-left: 60px; padding-right: 60px; padding-bottom: 15px;">
    <span style="font-weight: normal; color: #404040; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 23px;" align="left" class="bodycopy">Smart LED bulbs last longer and use less energy than ordinary bulbs. Not only that, but you can change their colour, warmth and brightness using your voice or an app. According to the Energy Saving Trust, switching to smart bulbs could save the average household around £30 a year.†  </span>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

  </td>
 </tr>
</table>
</td></tr></table><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" role="presentation" style="min-width: 100%; " class="stylingblock-content-wrapper"><tr><td class="stylingblock-content-wrapper camarker-inner"><table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 600px!important;">
 <tr>
  <td align="left" valign="top" class="contents leftrightpadding" style="padding-left: 60px; padding-right: 60px; padding-bottom: 30px;">
    <span style="font-weight: normal; color: #404040; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 23px;" align="left" class="bodycopy">Say goodbye to standby. Smart plugs let you control your appliances remotely, so you won’t waste energy by leaving devices that you’re not using turned on. The Energy Saving Trust says it’s possible to save £35 a year by turning off electronics you’re not using.† </span>

 </tr>

     <span style="font-weight: normal; color:#404040; font-family: Futura, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; line-height: 12px;" class="footertext">The Registered Office of <span class="appleLinksGrey" style="color:#404040; text-decoration: none;">Shell Energy Retail Limited is Shell Energy House, Westwood Business Park, Westwood Way, Coventry CV4 8HS. Registered in England and Wales. Company number 05070887</span>.
   <br>
   <br>
   Please take a couple of moments to read our <a style="color: #404040; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/disclaimers/email-disclaimer" target="_blank">important electronic communications disclaimer</a>.
        <br>
   <br>
   *Your voucher code may only be redeemed in the Shell Energy shop against products within the Smart Energy category, in accordance with your terms and conditions. All other Shell Energy shop products are excluded from this offer and the voucher code may not be redeemed against those products. The full list of Smart Energy products against which the voucher code may be redeemed can be found at shop.shellenergy.co.uk/smart-energy. The terms and conditions for your Shell Energy shop voucher will be sent to you via email and will outline the dates in which you can redeem your voucher. 
   <br>
   <br>
  † Source: Energy Saving Trust (<a style="color: #404040; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://energysavingtrust.org.uk/hub/quick-tips-to-save-energy/" target="_blank">Quick tips to save energy</a>, 2021). Please be aware that actual savings are not guaranteed and are dependent on your chosen energy tariff and usage habits.
        <br>
   <br>      
   As a supplier of electricity and gas, we’re regulated by Ofgem. And because we offer broadband services, we’re also regulated by Ofcom as a communications provider.
   <br>
   <br>
   We’re committed to keeping our customers’ personal information private and secure. To find out more about how we process your data and monitor communications, you can view our privacy policy <a style="color: #404040; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/policies/privacy" target="_blank">here</a>.
   <br>
   <br>
   You can’t reply to this message so if you need to get in touch, please see our <a style="color: #404040; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/contact-us" target="_blank">Contact Us</a> page.
   <br>
   <br>
  
   If you no longer want to receive marketing emails you can unsubscribe <a style="color: #404040; text-decoration: underline;" target="_blank" href="%%=RedirectTo(@URL_PreferenceCentre)=%%">here</a>.
   <br>
